summary: "Toy Story 2" is a 1999 animated adventure comedy, the sequel to the original "Toy Story." When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz Lightyear and his friends set out to rescue him. Woody is tempted by the idea of living forever in a museum. The film was first planned as a direct-to-video release but was later upgraded to a theatrical release. Despite production challenges, it became a huge success, grossing over $511 million and receiving critical acclaim. It's considered one of the best animated sequels and won a Golden Globe.
title: Toy Story 2
